meanings: (일·책임 등을) leave (sth to sb), assign (sb sth), entrust (sb with sth)
실용회화-기본대화 Should I check in this luggage?

vlive.korean: 근데 언제 끝날지는 진짜 하늘에 맡겨야 되는? But we need to leave it up to the heavens as to when it will end. 듣기 View video AB6IX : 비오는 퇴근길 ☔
vlive.english: But we need to leave it up to the heavens as to when it will end.

vlive.korean: 여러분들 상상에 맡겨야 돼요. I need to leave it up to your imagination. 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#148. 아이들 라디오 (w. (여자)아이들)
vlive.english: I need to leave it up to your imagination.

vlive.korean: 그거 맡겨야 돼요? - 그렇구나. Do they have to? - I see. 듣기 View video DAY6 : DayDream in BKK
vlive.english: Do they have to? - I see.

vlive.korean: 핸드폰 공연장에서 맡겨야 돼요? Do they have to check the cellphones in the concert? 듣기 View video DAY6 : DayDream in BKK
vlive.english: Do they have to check the cellphones in the concert?

vlive.korean: 그냥 이 게임 운영진에게 맡겨야 될 것 같아요. I think you have to depend on luck for that game. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 예린이의 화장한 날😙2
vlive.english: I think you have to depend on luck for that game.

examples.korean: When we moved we had to put our furniture in storage for a while. 발음듣기 우리는 이사를 할 때 가구를 한동안 보관 회사에 맡겨야 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: When we moved we had to put our furniture in storage for a while. 발음

examples.korean: Not a lot of damage, but still need to bring it into the bodyshop for a few days. 발음듣기 손상이 큰 건 아닌데 며칠 정비소에 맡겨야 돼. DARAKWON
examples.english: Not a lot of damage, but still need to bring it into the bodyshop for a few days. 발음

examples.korean: He had to have his house repaired. 발음듣기 그는 집 수리를 맡겨야 했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He had to have his house repaired. 발음

examples.korean: Why should we trust them with a job? 발음듣기 우리가 왜 그들에게 일을 맡겨야 합니까? Neungyule
examples.english: Why should we trust them with a job? 발음

examples.korean: I have to drop off something at the dry cleaners. 발음듣기 세탁소에다 옷을 몇 가지 맡겨야 해. Neungyule
examples.english: I have to drop off something at the dry cleaners. 발음
